briefdescription.para: Returns the blend mode for the effect.

simplesect.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Returns the blur level (strength) for the shadow.

simplesect.para: blur level. Value will be between 0 and 16, with larger values indicating greater blur strength.

briefdescription.para: Returns the color used for the shadow.
Returns the angle used for offsetting the shadow.

simplesect.para: offset angle in degrees clockwise from North

briefdescription.para: Returns the distance used for offsetting the shadow.

simplesect.para: offset distance. Distance units are retrieved via offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale used for the shadow offset distance.

simplesect.para: map unit scale for offset distance

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shadow offset distance.
Returns the opacity for the effect.

simplesect.para: opacity value between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque

briefdescription.para: Returns the properties describing the paint effect encoded in a string format.

simplesect.para: string map of properties, in the form property key, value

briefdescription.para: Reads a string map of an effect's properties and restores the effect to the state described by the properties map.

parameterdescription.para: effect properties encoded in a string map

briefdescription.para: Sets the blend mode for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Sets blur level (strength) for the shadow.

parameterdescription.para: blur level. Values between 0 and 16 are valid, with larger values indicating greater blur strength.

briefdescription.para: Sets the color for the shadow.
Sets the angle for offsetting the shadow.

parameterdescription.para: offset angle in degrees clockwise from North

briefdescription.para: Sets the distance for offsetting the shadow.

parameterdescription.para: offset distance. Units are specified via setOffsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale used for the shadow offset distance.

parameterdescription.para: map unit scale for offset distance

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shadow offset distance.
Sets the opacity for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: double between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque

briefdescription.para: Returns the bounding rect required for drawing the effect.

detaileddescription.para:
This method can be used to expand the bounding rect of a source picture to account for offset or blurring effects.
rect
original source bounding rect
context
destination render context
modified bounding rect
sourceAsImage

briefdescription.para: Handles drawing of the effect's result on to the specified render context.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must reimplement this method to apply any transformations to the source QPicture and draw the result using the context's painter.
context
destination render context
drawSource

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the shadow is drawn outside the picture or within the picture.

simplesect.para: true if shadow is to be drawn outside the picture, or false to draw shadow within the picture

briefdescription.para: Base class for paint effects which offset, blurred shadows.
